name: Verse Hit
description:
Compete for the best interpretation of a poem, or be the fastest to hit the right picture for each verse!

Verse hit is a printable card game containing cards with poetic verses and cards with hand drawn imagery. 

In one version of the game, you and a competing player will fight to associate poetry with images the best! How well can you interpret a verse?

If you have a competitive heart, Karuta-Style play is for you! Based off of the Japanese card game Karuta, you and a competing player fight to hit the correct images the fastest when a verse is read.

What style do you enjoy best? Download and find out!

Includes:

-Poetic Verse cards, featuring poems from poets such as Poe, Wordsworth, Dickinson, and many more.

-Hand drawn imagery cards

-Rules for both interpretive style and Karuta style gameplay

-A card association guide for Karuta style gameplay
